inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TPO and / or Tg> 60 IU / ml

inclusion.criterion: Abnormal thyroid function that requires substitution treatment with L-thyroxine
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: TSH > 5 micro-units per milliliter (mcU/ml) and decreased or normal levels of fT4 or fT3

exclusion.criterion: Presence of another chronic disease or autoimmune disease or being under medication
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis, high anti-TPO levels, and abnormal thyroid function requiring substitution treatment. She is still overweight but her symptoms improved with Levothyroxine.
